short_summary: Instruments and Laboratory Equipment – EX02 Sondes
description: 1. This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PV-19EQUI and covers a requirement from the following Product of the SA: EX02 Sondes.2. Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery to Burlington, Ontario by desired date of March 10, 2023. 3. This NPP covers a requirement to be solicited amongst the General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders).4. This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement and the Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.5. The bid solicitation is also open to suppliers who are not Supply Arrangement (SA) holders. In order for new suppliers to bid on this solicitation, the new supplier must first qualify for a SA. The process to qualify for a SA is detailed in RFSA # E60PV-19EQUI and can be found on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS - https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders). Canada is not required to delay the award of a resulting contract pending the evaluation of an arrangement and issuance of a SA by the PWGSC Supply Arrangement Authority.",
full_summary:
<Tender Information>
=====================

### Tender Title and Reference

*   English: Instruments and Laboratory Equipment – EX02 Sondes
*   French: Équipement et instruments de laboratoire – Sondes EX02
*   Reference Number: PW-23-01021324
*   Solicitation Number: 30003610

### Tender Details

*   Tender Status: Expired
*   Tender Closing Date: January 30, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
*   Amendment Date: January 20, 2023
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None

### Goods or Services

*   GIN: *N6685*
*   GIN Description: *Pressure, Temperature and Humidity Measuring and Controlling Instruments*
*   UNSPSC: None
*   UNSPSC Description: None

### Trade Agreements

*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Regional Opportunities

*   Region: Canada
*   Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity

*   Company Name: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
*   Address: 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada
*   Contact Information:
    *   Name: Marius Lacasse
    *   Email: marius.lacasse@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
    *   Phone: None
    *   Fax: None

### Notice and Attachments

*   Notice URL: None
*   Attachments: None

### Tender Description

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is inviting suppliers to bid on the acquisition and delivery of EX02 Sondes to Burlington, Ontario by March 10, 2023. The requirement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement and Canadian Free Trade Agreement. Suppliers must be pre-qualified and hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) to participate in this tender. Suppliers not holding an SA may also submit their bid but must also obtain an SA for evaluation. The process for becoming eligible for an SA is outlined in RFSA # E60PV-19
